channel.title: Comments on: Reminder About WordCamp Utah Planning

item.title: By: Lorelle
item.dc:creator: Lorelle
item.description: Good luck with the planning meeting and let me know how I can help. This is so exciting, and what a great opportunity to connect bloggers and web technologies in Utah together, too.
item.content:encoded: Good luck with the planning meeting and let me know how I can help. This is so exciting, and what a great opportunity to connect bloggers and web technologies in Utah together, too.
